name: Beware The Ghost
description:
[THIS GAME REQUIRES A SECOND MONITOR TO PLAY]

A 3D local multiplayer game played with 2 screens.

GHOST  1 player is the ghost and can posses objects and use them to attack the others.

INVESTIGATORS  1-4 other players play on the second screen and try to unlock all the grimoires before the it's too late.

2 SCREENS The investigators share a screen and can't see what the ghost is up to.

WORK IN-PROGRESS This game is in development and you can try the latest prototype build for free.

The basics should work, but there are a few known issues:

  • Screens can be temperamental.
  • No sound
  • Balancing for player number.
  • All players are toads for some reason.
  • No options for matches.
